TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FillMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定如何填充闭合路径的内部。

span.span: Specifies how the interior of a closed path is filled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序填充使用两种填充模式之一的路径的内部： 备用或绕。An application fills the interior of a path using one of two fill modes: alternate or winding. 模式将确定如何填充和剪辑闭合图形的内部。The mode determines how to fill and clip the interior of a closed figure. 默认模式为备用。The default mode is Alternate. 若要确定的在备用模式下的闭合图形的内部，请从路径中的任意起始点到某个时间点显然位于路径外绘制线条。To determine the interiors of closed figures in the alternate mode, draw a line from any arbitrary start point in the path to some point obviously outside the path. 如果该直线跨过奇数数目的路径段，起始点在已关闭的区域内，因此填充或剪辑区域的一部分。If the line crosses an odd number of path segments, the starting point is inside the closed region and is therefore part of the fill or clipping area. 为偶数的交叉点进行表示点不在一个区域来填充或剪切。An even number of crossings means that the point is not in an area to be filled or clipped. 打开图是填充还是使用行连接到图的第一个点的最后一个点剪切。An open figure is filled or clipped by using a line to connect the last point to the first point of the figure. 绕组模式会将每个交点处的路径段的方向。The Winding mode considers the direction of the path segments at each intersection. 它将添加一个用于每个顺时针旋转的交集，和减去一个用于每一逆时针交叉。It adds one for every clockwise intersection, and subtracts one for every counterclockwise intersection. 如果结果不为零，点被认为在填充或剪辑区域内。If the result is nonzero, the point is considered inside the fill or clip area. 计数为零意味着点超出填充或剪辑区域。A zero count means that the point lies outside the fill or clip area. 图是沿顺时针方向视为或逆时针旋转基于在其中绘制图的段的顺序。A figure is considered clockwise or counterclockwise based on the order in which the segments of the figure are drawn. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有一个开放图形 （一段弧线） 和一个闭合的图形 （椭圆） 的路径。The following example creates a path that has one open figure (an arc) and one closed figure (an ellipse). FillPath 方法填充根据默认的填充模式，即 Alternate.The 路径以下图显示的代码示例的输出。The FillPath method fills the path according to the default fill mode, which is Alternate.The following illustration shows the output of the example code. 请注意，路径填充 （根据备选） 中，就像打开图关闭的一条直线从其结束的点到起始点。Note that the path is filled (according to Alternate) as if the open figure were closed by a straight line from its ending point to its starting point. ![填充开放路径](~/add/media/fillopenpath.png "填充开放路径")![Fill Open Path](~/add/media/fillopenpath.png "Fill Open Path") 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths/CS/Class1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode Alternate = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode Winding = int32(1)
